00027 
00029 void AlphaCalibrator::Calibrate(DrawObjContainer *c)
00030 {
00031    Info("Calibrate", "Called...");
00032 
00033    string    sCh("  ");
00034    TH1F     *htemp     = 0;
00035    TFitResultPtr fitres;
00036    bool     fit_gadolinium = gMeasInfo->GetAlphaSourceCount() == 2;
00037 
00038    for (UShort_t i = 1; i <= NSTRIP; i++) {
00039       sprintf(&sCh[0], "%02d", i);
00040 
00041       ChannelCalib *chCalib;
00042       ChannelCalibMap::iterator iChCalib = fChannelCalibs.find(i);
00043 
00044       if (iChCalib != fChannelCalibs.end()) {
00045          chCalib = &iChCalib->second;
00046       }
00047       else {
00048          ChannelCalib newChCalib;
00049          fChannelCalibs[i] = newChCalib;
00050          chCalib = &fChannelCalibs[i];
00051       }
00052 
00053       // Amplitude
00054       htemp = (TH1F*) c->d["alpha"]->d["channel" + sCh]->o["hAmpltd_ch" + sCh];
00055 
00056       if (!htemp) {
00057          Error("Calibrate", "Histogram channel%02d/hAmpltd_ch%02d does not exist", i, i);
00058          continue;
00059       }
00060 
00061       fitres = Calibrate(htemp, fit_gadolinium);
00062 
00063       if (fitres) {
00064          chCalib->fAmAmp = CoefExtract(fitres, kAmericium, c, i, "");
00065          if (fit_gadolinium) {
00066             chCalib->fGdAmp = CoefExtract(fitres, kGadolinium, c, i, "");
00067             AmGdPlot(chCalib, c, i, sCh);
00068          }
00069       }
00070 
00071       // Integral
00072       htemp = (TH1F*) c->d["alpha"]->d["channel" + sCh]->o["hIntgrl_ch" + sCh];
00073 
00074       if (!htemp) {
00075          Error("Calibrate", "Histogram channel%02d/hIntgrl_ch%02d does not exist", i, i);
00076          continue;
00077       }
00078 
00079       fitres = Calibrate(htemp, fit_gadolinium);
00080 
00081       if (fitres.Get()) {
00082          chCalib->fAmInt = CoefExtract(fitres, kAmericium, c, i, "Int");
00083          if (fit_gadolinium) {
00084             chCalib->fGdInt = CoefExtract(fitres, kGadolinium, c, i, "Int");
00085          }
00086       } else {
00087          Error("Calibrate", "Empty TFitResultPtr");
00088       }
00089    }
00090 
00091    const double   STOPPING_POWER_GD = 190, STOPPING_POWER_AM = 140; // keV/(\mu m)
00092    c->d["alpha"]->o["hDeadLayerSize"] = new TH1F(
00093        SILICON_DENSITY*100 * AM_ALPHA_E * GD_ALPHA_E * ((*(TH1F*) c->d["alpha"]->o["hGdGain"]) - (*(TH1F*) c->d["alpha"]->o["hAmGain"]))
00094        /
00095        (
00096           GD_ALPHA_E * (*(TH1F*) c->d["alpha"]->o["hGdGain"]) * STOPPING_POWER_AM
00097           -
00098           AM_ALPHA_E * (*(TH1F*) c->d["alpha"]->o["hAmGain"]) * STOPPING_POWER_GD
00099        )
00100    );
00101    ((TH1F*) c->d["alpha"]->o["hDeadLayerSize"])->SetName("hDeadLayerSize");
00102    ((TH1F*) c->d["alpha"]->o["hDeadLayerSize"])->SetTitle("hDeadLayerSize");
00103    ((TH1F*) c->d["alpha"]->o["hDeadLayerSize"])->GetXaxis()->SetTitle("Channel");
00104    ((TH1F*) c->d["alpha"]->o["hDeadLayerSize"])->GetYaxis()->SetTitle("Dead layer size, \\mu g/cm^2");
00105    ((TH1F*) c->d["alpha"]->o["hDeadLayerSize"])->SetOption("E1 GRIDX GRIDY");
00106 
00107 
00108    CalibrateBadChannels(c);
00109 }
00110 
00111 
00113 CalibCoefSet AlphaCalibrator::CoefExtract (
00114    const TFitResultPtr &fitres, ESource source_offset,
00115    DrawObjContainer *c, UShort_t i, std::string suffix
00116 )
00117 {
00118    // Typical value for long_name is "Intgrl", for short_name it is "I"
00119 
00120    CalibCoefSet result;
00121 
00122    float peak_energy = AM_ALPHA_E;
00123    std::string  name;
00124 
00125    if (source_offset == kAmericium)
00126    {
00127       peak_energy = AM_ALPHA_E;
00128       name = "Am" + suffix;
00129    } else if (source_offset == kGadolinium) {
00130       peak_energy = GD_ALPHA_E;
00131       name = "Gd" + suffix;
00132    } else {
00133       Error("CoefExtract", "Bad source type");
00134    }
00135 
00136    result.fPeakPos    = fitres->Value(source_offset + 1);
00137    result.fPeakPosErr = fitres->FitResult::Error(source_offset + 1);
00138    result.fCoef       = (peak_energy / result.fPeakPos) * ATTEN;
00139    result.fCoefErr    = result.fCoef * result.fPeakPosErr / result.fPeakPos;
00140    result.fChi2Ndf    = fitres->Ndf() > 0 ? fitres->Chi2() / fitres->Ndf() : -1;
00141 
00142    float width_value = 100 * fitres->Value(source_offset + 2) / result.fPeakPos;
00143    float width_error = 100 * fitres->FitResult::Error(source_offset + 2) / result.fPeakPos;
00144    ((TH1F*) c->d["alpha"]->o["h" + name + "GainWidth"])->SetBinContent(i, width_value);
00145    ((TH1F*) c->d["alpha"]->o["h" + name + "GainWidth"])->SetBinError(i, width_error);
00146 
00147    float gain_value = 1 / result.fCoef;
00148    float gain_error = gain_value * (result.fCoefErr / result.fCoef);
00149    ((TH1F*) c->d["alpha"]->o["h" + name + "Gain"])->SetBinContent(i, gain_value);
00150    ((TH1F*) c->d["alpha"]->o["h" + name + "Gain"])->SetBinError(i, gain_error);
00151 
00152    ((TH1F*) c->d["alpha"]->o["h" + name + "GainDisp"])->Fill(gain_value);
00153 
00154    return result;
00155 }

00157 
00158 void AlphaCalibrator::AmGdPlot(
00159    const ChannelCalib *chCalib, DrawObjContainer *c, int iCh, const string &sCh
00160 )
00161 {
00162    TH2F         *hAmGd = (TH2F*) c->d["alpha"]->d["channel" + sCh]->o["hAmGd_ch" + sCh];
00163    TGraphErrors *gAmGd = new TGraphErrors(2);
00164    gAmGd->SetName(string("gAmGd_ch" + sCh).c_str());
00165    gAmGd->SetPoint(0, AM_ALPHA_E / 1000, chCalib->fAmAmp.fPeakPos);
00166    gAmGd->SetPointError(0, 0, chCalib->fAmAmp.fPeakPosErr);
00167    gAmGd->SetPoint(1, GD_ALPHA_E / 1000, chCalib->fGdAmp.fPeakPos);
00168    gAmGd->SetPointError(1, 0, chCalib->fGdAmp.fPeakPosErr);
00169    hAmGd->GetListOfFunctions()->Add(gAmGd, "p");
00170    hAmGd->SetOption("DUMMY GRIDX GRIDY");
00171    hAmGd->SetTitle("; Energy, MeV; Peak, ADC Counts;");
00172    hAmGd->GetXaxis()->Set(1, 0, AM_ALPHA_E / 1000 * 1.1);
00173    hAmGd->GetYaxis()->Set(1, 0, chCalib->fAmAmp.fPeakPos * 1.3);
00174 
00175    TF1   func("func", "(x-[0])*[1]", 0, AM_ALPHA_E / 1000);
00176    TFitResultPtr fitres;
00177    fitres = gAmGd->Fit(&func, "S"); // S: return fitres
00178 
00179    float fit1, fit1_err, coef, coefErr, gain, gainErr;
00180    fit1 = fitres->Value(1);
00181    fit1_err = fitres->FitResult::Error(1);
00182    coef = ATTEN / fit1 * 1000;
00183    coefErr = coef * fit1_err / fit1;
00184    gain = 1 / coef;
00185    gainErr = gain * (coefErr / coef);
00186 
00187    ((TH1F*) c->d["alpha"]->o["hAmGdGain"])->SetBinContent(iCh, gain);
00188    ((TH1F*) c->d["alpha"]->o["hAmGdGain"])->SetBinError(iCh, gainErr);
00189 
00190    ((TH1F*) c->d["alpha"]->o["hDeadLayerEnergy"])->SetBinContent(iCh, fitres->Value(0) * 1000);
00191    ((TH1F*) c->d["alpha"]->o["hDeadLayerEnergy"])->SetBinError(iCh, fitres->FitResult::Error(0) * 1000);
00192 }

00194 
00196 TFitResultPtr AlphaCalibrator::Calibrate(TH1F *h, bool fit_gadolinium)
00197 {
00198    TF1 f_amer("f_amer", "gaus");
00199    TF1 f_two_peak("fitfunc", "gaus(0) + gaus(3)");
00200    TFitResultPtr fitres = 0;
00201 
00202    f_amer.SetLineColor(kRed);
00203    f_amer.SetLineWidth(3);
00204    f_amer.SetNpx(500);
00205    f_two_peak.SetLineColor(kRed);
00206    f_two_peak.SetLineWidth(3);
00207    f_two_peak.SetNpx(500);
00208 
00209    h->Print();
00210    float xmin = h->GetXaxis()->GetXmin();
00211    float xmax = h->GetXaxis()->GetXmax();
00212 
00213    if (h->Integral() < 10) {
00214       Error("Calibrate", "Too few entries in histogram %s. Skipped", h->GetName());
00215       return 0;
00216    }
00217 
00218    // First fit is to find americium peak
00219    // Will start from guessing initial params
00220    int   mbin_amer = utils::FindMaximumBinEx(h, 1);
00221    float norm_amer = h->GetBinContent(mbin_amer);
00222    float mean_amer = h->GetBinCenter(mbin_amer);
00223    float expectedSigma = 0.7;
00224 
00225    if (norm_amer <= 5) {
00226       Error("Calibrate", "Peaks are too small in histogram %s. Skipped", h->GetName());
00227       return 0;
00228    }
00229 
00230    f_amer.SetParameters(norm_amer, mean_amer, expectedSigma);
00231    f_amer.SetParLimits(0, 0.8 * norm_amer, 1.2 * norm_amer); // norm
00232    f_amer.SetParLimits(1, xmin, xmax); // mean
00233    f_amer.SetParLimits(2, 0.1, 3 * expectedSigma); // sigma
00234 
00235    fitres = h->Fit(&f_amer, fit_gadolinium ? "BMSN" : "BMS"); // B: use limits, M: improve fit, S: return fitres, N: do not store graphic function
00236 
00237    if (fit_gadolinium) {
00238       Double_t par[6]; // params for more general fit
00239       f_amer.GetParameters(&par[0]); // copy found params there
00240 
00241       mean_amer = par[1];
00242       float sigma_amer = par[2];
00243 
00244       // Now let's find initial params for gadolinium peak
00245       float xmax_gad = min(mean_amer - 5 * sigma_amer, mean_amer * 3/4);
00246       // Use predicted gad peak position to track the right peak
00247       float predicted_gad = mean_amer / AM_ALPHA_E * GD_ALPHA_E;
00248       float xmin_gad = predicted_gad - 4 * sigma_amer;
00249       h->GetXaxis()->SetRangeUser(xmin_gad, xmax_gad);
00250       int   mbin_gad = h->GetMaximumBin();
00251       h->GetXaxis()->SetRange(); // reset range
00252       float norm_gad = h->GetBinContent(mbin_gad);
00253       float mean_gad = h->GetBinCenter(mbin_gad);
00254 
00255       if (norm_gad <= 3)
00256       {
00257          return 0;
00258       }
00259 
00260       par[3] = norm_gad;
00261       par[4] = mean_gad;
00262       par[5] = expectedSigma;
00263       f_two_peak.SetParameters(par);
00264 
00265       f_two_peak.SetParLimits(3, 0.8 * norm_gad, 1.2 * norm_gad); // norm
00266       f_two_peak.SetParLimits(4, xmin_gad, xmax_gad); // mean
00267       f_two_peak.SetParLimits(5, 0.1, 3 * expectedSigma); // sigma
00268 
00269       // And make sure that our existing peak won't too far
00270       f_two_peak.SetParLimits(0, 0.8 * norm_amer, 1.2 * norm_amer); // norm
00271       f_two_peak.SetParLimits(1, mean_amer - sigma_amer, mean_amer + sigma_amer); // mean
00272       f_two_peak.SetParLimits(2, 0.8 * sigma_amer, 1.2 * sigma_amer); // sigma
00273 
00274       fitres = h->Fit(&f_two_peak, "BMS"); // B: use limits, M: improve fit, S: return fitres
00275    }
00276 
00277    return fitres;
00278 }

00282 void AlphaCalibrator::CalibrateBadChannels(DrawObjContainer *c)
00283 {
00284    Double_t aMean = ((TH1F*) c->d["alpha"]->o["hAmGainDisp"])->GetMean();
00285    Double_t aRMS  = ((TH1F*) c->d["alpha"]->o["hAmGainDisp"])->GetRMS();
00286    //Double_t iMean = ((TH1F*) c->d["alpha"]->o["hAmIntGainDisp"])->GetMean();
00287    //Double_t iRMS  = ((TH1F*) c->d["alpha"]->o["hAmIntGainDisp"])->GetRMS();
00288 
00289    Double_t aEntries  = 0;
00290 
00291    Double_t Det1eRMS  = 0;
00292    Double_t Det2eRMS  = 0;
00293    Double_t Det3eRMS  = 0;
00294    Double_t Det4eRMS  = 0;
00295    Double_t Det5eRMS  = 0;
00296    Double_t Det6eRMS  = 0;
00297    Double_t Det1eMean = 0;
00298    Double_t Det2eMean = 0;
00299    Double_t Det3eMean = 0;
00300    Double_t Det4eMean = 0;
00301    Double_t Det5eMean = 0;
00302    Double_t Det6eMean = 0;
00303 
00304    string sSi("  ");
00305 
00306    for (int i = 1; i <= NSTRIP; i++)
00307    {
00308       sprintf(&sSi[0], "%02d", i);
00309       aEntries = ((TH1F*) c->d["alpha"]->d["channel" + sSi]->o["hAmpltd_ch" + sSi])->GetEntries();
00310 
00311       if (i > 0 && i < 13) {
00312          ((TH1F*) c->d["alpha"]->o["Detector1_Events"])->SetBinContent(i, aEntries);
00313          ((TH1F*) c->d["alpha"]->o["Detector1_Events_Dsp"])->Fill(aEntries);
00314 
00315       }
00316       if (i > 12 && i < 25) {
00317          ((TH1F*) c->d["alpha"]->o["Detector2_Events"])->SetBinContent(i - 12, aEntries);
00318          ((TH1F*) c->d["alpha"]->o["Detector2_Events_Dsp"])->Fill(aEntries);
00319 
00320       }
00321       if (i > 24 && i < 37) {
00322          ((TH1F*) c->d["alpha"]->o["Detector3_Events"])->SetBinContent(i - 24, aEntries);
00323          ((TH1F*) c->d["alpha"]->o["Detector3_Events_Dsp"])->Fill(aEntries);
00324 
00325       }
00326       if (i > 36 && i < 49) {
00327          ((TH1F*) c->d["alpha"]->o["Detector4_Events"])->SetBinContent(i - 36, aEntries);
00328          ((TH1F*) c->d["alpha"]->o["Detector4_Events_Dsp"])->Fill(aEntries);
00329 
00330       }
00331       if (i > 48 && i < 61) {
00332          ((TH1F*) c->d["alpha"]->o["Detector5_Events"])->SetBinContent(i - 48, aEntries);
00333          ((TH1F*) c->d["alpha"]->o["Detector5_Events_Dsp"])->Fill(aEntries);
00334 
00335       }
00336       if (i > 60 && i < 73) {
00337          ((TH1F*) c->d["alpha"]->o["Detector6_Events"])->SetBinContent(i - 60, aEntries);
00338          ((TH1F*) c->d["alpha"]->o["Detector6_Events_Dsp"])->Fill(aEntries);
00339 
00340       }
00341    }
00342 
00343    Det1eMean = ((TH1F*) c->d["alpha"]->o["Detector1_Events_Dsp"])->GetMean();
00344    Det1eRMS  = ((TH1F*) c->d["alpha"]->o["Detector1_Events_Dsp"])->GetRMS();
00345    Det2eMean = ((TH1F*) c->d["alpha"]->o["Detector2_Events_Dsp"])->GetMean();
00346    Det2eRMS  = ((TH1F*) c->d["alpha"]->o["Detector2_Events_Dsp"])->GetRMS();
00347    Det3eMean = ((TH1F*) c->d["alpha"]->o["Detector3_Events_Dsp"])->GetMean();
00348    Det3eRMS  = ((TH1F*) c->d["alpha"]->o["Detector3_Events_Dsp"])->GetRMS();
00349    Det4eMean = ((TH1F*) c->d["alpha"]->o["Detector4_Events_Dsp"])->GetMean();
00350    Det4eRMS  = ((TH1F*) c->d["alpha"]->o["Detector4_Events_Dsp"])->GetRMS();
00351    Det5eMean = ((TH1F*) c->d["alpha"]->o["Detector5_Events_Dsp"])->GetMean();
00352    Det5eRMS  = ((TH1F*) c->d["alpha"]->o["Detector5_Events_Dsp"])->GetRMS();
00353    Det6eMean = ((TH1F*) c->d["alpha"]->o["Detector6_Events_Dsp"])->GetMean();
00354    Det6eRMS  = ((TH1F*) c->d["alpha"]->o["Detector6_Events_Dsp"])->GetRMS();
00355 
00356    ChannelCalibMap::iterator mi, mi2;
00357    ChannelCalibMap::iterator mb  = fChannelCalibs.begin();
00358    ChannelCalibMap::iterator me  = fChannelCalibs.end();
00359    int i;
00360 
00361    for (i = 1, mi = mb; mi != me; mi++, i++)
00362    {
00363       sprintf(&sSi[0], "%02d", i);
00364       aEntries = ((TH1F*) c->d["alpha"]->d["channel" + sSi]->o["hAmpltd_ch" + sSi])->GetEntries();
00365 
00366       ChannelCalib &ch = mi->second;
00367 
00368       // Invalidate channels even if the fitter returned some results
00369       if (i > 0 && i <= 12) {
00370          if (fabs(aMean - ch.fAmAmp.fCoef) > 2*aRMS ) {
00371             if (aEntries<1000 && aEntries >= 0 && fabs(Det1eMean - aEntries) > 2 * Det1eRMS && (aEntries - Det1eMean < 0)) {
00372                ch.fAmAmp.fCoefErr = -1;
00373             }
00374          }
00375       }
00376       if (i > 12 && i <= 24) {
00377          if (fabs(aMean - ch.fAmAmp.fCoef) > 2*aRMS ) {
00378             if (aEntries<1000 && aEntries >= 0 && fabs(Det2eMean - aEntries) > 2 * Det2eRMS && (aEntries - Det2eMean < 0)) {
00379                ch.fAmAmp.fCoefErr = -1;
00380             }
00381          }
00382       }
00383       if (i > 24 && i <= 36) {
00384          if (fabs(aMean - ch.fAmAmp.fCoef) > 2*aRMS ) {
00385             if (aEntries<1000 && aEntries >= 0 && fabs(Det3eMean - aEntries) > 2 * Det3eRMS && (aEntries - Det3eMean < 0)) {
00386                ch.fAmAmp.fCoefErr = -1;
00387             }
00388          }
00389       }
00390       if (i > 36 && i <= 48) {
00391          if (fabs(aMean - ch.fAmAmp.fCoef) > 2*aRMS ) {
00392             if (aEntries<1000 && aEntries >= 0 && fabs(Det4eMean - aEntries) > 2 * Det4eRMS && (aEntries - Det4eMean < 0)) {
00393                ch.fAmAmp.fCoefErr = -1;
00394             }
00395          }
00396       }
00397       if (i > 48 && i <= 60) {
00398          if (fabs(aMean - ch.fAmAmp.fCoef) > 2*aRMS ) {
00399             if (aEntries<1000 && aEntries >= 0 && fabs(Det5eMean - aEntries) > 2 * Det5eRMS && (aEntries - Det5eMean < 0)) {
00400                ch.fAmAmp.fCoefErr = -1;
00401             }
00402          }
00403       }
00404       if (i > 60 && i <= 72) {
00405          if (fabs(aMean - ch.fAmAmp.fCoef) > 2*aRMS ) {
00406             if (aEntries<1000 && aEntries >= 0 && fabs(Det6eMean - aEntries) > 2 * Det6eRMS && (aEntries - Det6eMean < 0)) {
00407                ch.fAmAmp.fCoefErr = -1;
00408             }
00409          }
00410       }
00411    }
00412 
00413    // Now assign detector average
00414    // Ampltitude
00415    for (mi = mb; mi != me; mi++) {
00416 
00417       ChannelCalib &ch = mi->second;
00418       if (ch.fAmAmp.fCoefErr >= 0) continue;
00419 
00420       short iDet = (short) floor((mi->first - 1) / 12);
00421       //printf("iDet: %d\n", iDet);
00422 
00423       float detAve = 0;
00424       short nChDet = 0;
00425 
00426       for (mi2 = mb; mi2 != me; mi2++) {
00427 
00428          ChannelCalib &ch2 = mi2->second;
00429          short iDet2 = (short) floor((mi2->first - 1) / 12);
00430          if (iDet == iDet2 && ch2.fAmAmp.fCoefErr >= 0) {
00431 
00432             //printf("iDet2: %d\n", iDet2);
00433             detAve += ch2.fAmAmp.fCoef;
00434             nChDet++;
00435          }
00436       }
00437 
00438       detAve    /= nChDet;
00439       ch.fAmAmp.fCoef  = detAve;
00440    }
00441 
00442    // Now assign detector average
00443    // Integral
00444    for (mi = mb; mi != me; mi++) {
00445 
00446       ChannelCalib &ch = mi->second;
00447       if (ch.fAmInt.fCoefErr >= 0) continue;
00448 
00449       short iDet = (short) floor((mi->first - 1) / 12);
00450       //printf("iDet: %d\n", iDet);
00451 
00452       float detAve = 0;
00453       short nChDet = 0;
00454 
00455       for (mi2 = mb; mi2 != me; mi2++) {
00456          ChannelCalib &ch2 = mi2->second;
00457          short iDet2 = (short) floor((mi2->first - 1) / 12);
00458          if (iDet == iDet2 && ch2.fAmInt.fCoefErr >= 0) {
00459             //printf("iDet2: %d\n", iDet2);
00460             detAve += ch2.fAmInt.fCoef;
00461             nChDet++;
00462          }
00463       }
00464 
00465       detAve    /= nChDet;
00466       ch.fAmInt.fCoef  = detAve;
00467    }
00468 }
